msg: Oops, forgot the most important piece.  (For EL function support.)

author: shawn
msg: Added support for JSP 2.0 functions to the JSTL EL.  By default,
the functions will not be enabled, so no new feature is added for the moment
to the Standard Taglib, which must comply with the JSTL 1.0 specification

author: shawn
msg: Another attempt to simplify support for relative system IDs.

author: shawn
msg: Applied a patch (modified slightly with respect to naming and formatting)
from Peter Lin to improve XPath performance by caching parsed representations

author: shawn
msg: Added <welcome-file-list> element to web applications' deployment
